CustomField.description: Calculates the number of Business Days left between Today and the Close Date. If the Opportunity is Closed, the number is set to zero, otherwise the number will be negative
CustomField.formula: IF( IsClosed = true, 0, (5 * ( FLOOR( ( CloseDate - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( CloseDate - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates the number of Business Days left between Today and the Close Date. If the Opportunity is Closed, the number is set to zero, otherwise the number will be negative
CustomField.label: Days to Close
